charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F [18:2, 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C), 18:924(c) and 2] DID KNOWINGLY, INTENTIONALLY, AND WITHOUT AUTHORITY, POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUND OF COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE AND A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF MDMA OR ECSTASY, A SCHEDULE I CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE AND DID POSSESS A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME

[21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) and 18:2] POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE AND METHYLENEDIOXYMETHAMPHETAMINE (MDMA OR ECSTACY), A SCHEDULED I CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 36 months imprisonment followed by three years supervised release. Special Assessment $100.

charges.charge_description: [18:924(c) AND 2] POSSESS A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME FOR WHICH MAY BE PROSECUTED IN A COURT OF THE UNITED STATES(2)

[18:924(c) AND 2] POSSESS A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME FOR WHICH MAY BE PROSECUTED IN A COURT OF THE UNITED STATES(2)

[21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) and 18:2] POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE AND METHYLENEDIOXYMETHAMPHETAMINE (MDMA OR ECSTACY), A SCHEDULED I CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 110 months imprisonment, followed by 3 years of supervised release. $100 Special Assessment. The court recommends the defendant receive 500 hours of substance abuse treatment and placement at a BOP Facility locate in Massachusetts.

charges.charge_description: [18:924(c) AND 2] POSSESS A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME FOR WHICH MAY BE PROSECUTED IN A COURT OF THE UNITED STATES(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months imprisonment to run consecutive to Count 1, followed by 5 years of supervised release, to run concurrent with Count 1. $100 Special Assessment. The court recommends the defendant receive 500 hours of substance abuse treatment and placement at a BOP Facility locate in Massachusetts.
